extracted_information: HyperEVM serves as a platform for arbitrary user applications, abstracting the deep liquidity available on HyperCore. It allows smart contracts, specifically those written in Solidity, to directly interact with HyperCore's order books. This enables functionalities like reading real-time prices and executing trades for actions such as protocolized liquidations.

interaction_mechanisms.read_precompile: Enables smart contracts to read data (e.g., XYZ/ABC prices) directly from HyperCore order books.
interaction_mechanisms.write_system_contract: Allows smart contracts to send orders (e.g., swap XYZ and ABC) directly to HyperCore order books.

specifications.developer_compatibility: Solidity (uses built-in functions for HyperCore interactions)

features: Direct reading of prices from HyperCore order books.
Direct sending of orders for token swaps on HyperCore order books.
Implementation of protocolized liquidations similar to HyperCore's perps.
Abstraction of HyperCore's deep liquidity as a building block for user applications.
